description: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He has over 30 years of experience in the culinary industry, and has earned 16 Michelin stars throughout his career. He is known for his fiery personality and has hosted several cooking shows such as Hell's Kitchen and MasterChef.

recipes.name: Chingri Macher Malaikari
recipes.method_of_cooking: 1. Fry prawns in oil until cooked. 2. In a separate pan, mix coconut milk, ginger paste, garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, and salt. 3. Add prawns to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot with rice.
